side_arcs.title: The Last Transmission
side_arcs.description: The survivor intercepts a desperate radio transmission from a nearby survivor group under siege by zombies. They must decide whether to risk venturing out to rescue them or stay safe in their hideout.

events.title: Static and Screams
events.description: While scavenging for supplies, the survivor picks up a faint radio transmission. A panicked voice pleads for help before the signal cuts out.

events.title: The Decision
events.description: The survivor debates whether to investigate the transmission. They recall the increased zombie activity and the risks involved.

events.title: Scouting the Area
events.description: The survivor cautiously scouts the area mentioned in the transmission, finding signs of a recent struggle but no survivors.

events.title: Trapped
events.description: The survivor discovers the source of the transmission—a small group barricaded in a nearby building, surrounded by zombies.

events.title: The Rescue
events.description: The survivor devises a plan to distract the zombies and lead the trapped group to safety.

events.title: Aftermath
events.description: The rescued group shares valuable information about the zombie movements and a potential safe zone, but the survivor must decide whether to trust them.

rewards.description: Details about a potential safe zone and zombie movement patterns.
Gains trust with the rescued group, potentially leading to future alliances.

characters.name: Dr. Elena Vasquez
characters.role: Leader of the trapped survivor group, a former scientist with knowledge of the zombie outbreak.

characters.name: Marcus Greene
characters.role: A former soldier in the group, skilled in combat and survival tactics.

side_arcs.failure_consequences: If the survivor fails, the trapped group is overrun by zombies, and the opportunity for valuable information and allies is lost. The survivor may also attract more zombies to their own hideout.

side_arcs.title: Silent Siege
side_arcs.description: The eerie silence outside the safehouse is unsettling. The survivor must fortify their shelter against an unseen threat while uncovering the reason behind the zombies' sudden disappearance.

events.title: The Quiet Before the Storm
events.description: The survivor notices the complete absence of zombies in the area. They decide to use this opportunity to scout for materials to reinforce the safehouse.

events.title: Gathering Supplies
events.description: The survivor ventures out to nearby buildings, collecting wood, nails, and other fortification materials. They hear distant, unfamiliar noises but see nothing.

events.title: Strange Discoveries
events.description: While reinforcing the safehouse, the survivor finds strange markings on the walls outside. They also discover a journal hinting at a 'Watchers' group observing the area.

events.title: The Watchers' Signal
events.description: The survivor spots a flare in the distance, followed by the sound of engines. It seems the Watchers are signaling something—or someone.

events.title: Fortified but Watched
events.description: The survivor completes the fortifications, but the safehouse now feels like a target. The Watchers' presence looms, and the zombies' absence remains unexplained.

rewards.description: Gain additional fortification materials and a temporary safehouse defense bonus.
Learn about the Watchers and their possible connection to the zombies' behavior.

characters.name: The Watcher
characters.role: A mysterious figure observing the survivor's movements from afar.

side_arcs.failure_consequences: If the survivor fails to fortify the safehouse, the Watchers may exploit its weaknesses, leading to a breach or direct confrontation. The unexplained zombie absence could also result in a sudden, overwhelming attack.

side_arcs.title: Tunnel Wars
side_arcs.description: A rival survivor group has been spotted near Central Station, claiming the tunnels as their territory. The player must either negotiate, fight, or find another way to secure their position before tensions escalate.

events.title: Unwelcome Visitors
events.description: The player notices unfamiliar markings and signs of recent activity in the tunnels. A small group of survivors has left a warning message claiming the area as theirs.

events.title: First Contact
events.description: The rival group makes direct contact, demanding the player vacate the tunnels. They seem armed but hesitant to attack outright.

events.title: Scouting the Enemy
events.description: The player has the opportunity to scout the rival group's camp, learning more about their numbers, resources, and weaknesses.

events.title: Negotiations or Sabotage
events.description: The player can attempt to negotiate a truce or alliance, or sabotage the rival group's supplies to weaken their position.

events.title: Escalation
events.description: Tensions reach a boiling point. Depending on previous choices, this could lead to a standoff, a fight, or a tense but peaceful resolution.

events.title: Resolution
events.description: The conflict is resolved—either through force, diplomacy, or the player being forced to retreat. The tunnels' fate is decided.

rewards.description: Secure access to the tunnels and their resources (food, shelter, hidden caches).
Potential allies or trading partners if negotiations succeed.
Intel on other survivor factions in the area.

characters.name: Mara
characters.role: Leader of the rival survivor group. Pragmatic but distrustful.

characters.name: Jax
characters.role: Mara's second-in-command. Aggressive and eager to fight.

characters.name: Lena
characters.role: A neutral scavenger who knows both groups and may act as a mediator.

side_arcs.failure_consequences: The player is forced out of the tunnels, losing access to their shelter and resources. The rival group may become hostile in future encounters.

side_arcs.title: The Whispering Shadow
side_arcs.description: The survivor encounters a mysterious figure who leaves cryptic messages and supplies in their path. Following the clues leads to a tense confrontation and a revelation about the stranger's motives.

events.title: The First Sign
events.description: While scavenging in the tunnels, the survivor finds a small, neatly wrapped package containing medical supplies and a note with a single word: 'Follow.'

events.title: The Shadow Moves
events.description: The survivor spots a fleeting figure in the distance, always just out of reach. Another package is left behind, this time with a map pointing to a nearby safehouse.

events.title: The Safehouse
events.description: The survivor reaches the safehouse, only to find it booby-trapped. The mysterious stranger watches from the shadows, testing the survivor's skills and resolve.

events.title: The Revelation
events.description: The stranger finally reveals themselves—a former scientist studying the outbreak. They offer valuable information about the zombies' weaknesses before vanishing into the night.

rewards.description: Knowledge of a zombie weakness (e.g., sensitivity to loud noises)
A rare medical kit

characters.name: Dr. Elias Voss
characters.role: The mysterious stranger, a rogue scientist studying the outbreak

side_arcs.failure_consequences: The survivor gains no additional supplies or information, and the stranger's trail goes cold, leaving them with unanswered questions.

side_arcs.title: The Fog Dwellers
side_arcs.description: The survivor discovers that the moving fog in Central Station hides a group of hostile scavengers who have claimed the tunnels as their territory. The survivor must either negotiate, fight, or evade them to secure safe passage.

events.title: Whispers in the Fog
events.description: The survivor hears faint voices and footsteps in the fog, realizing they are not alone in the tunnels. A shadowy figure disappears into the mist, leaving behind a crude warning symbol.

events.title: The Scavengers' Demand
events.description: The scavengers reveal themselves, demanding the survivor hand over their supplies or leave the tunnels. They are led by a ruthless figure named Mercer, who seems to know more about the station than they let on.

events.title: Negotiation or Conflict
events.description: The survivor must choose: negotiate with Mercer for safe passage, fight the scavengers for control of the tunnels, or attempt to sneak past them undetected.

events.title: Resolution
events.description: Depending on the survivor's actions, they either gain an uneasy alliance with the scavengers, secure the tunnels for themselves, or are forced to flee, leaving behind valuable resources.

rewards.description: Access to a hidden stash of supplies in the tunnels if the survivor wins the conflict or negotiates successfully.
Clues about a safer route through the city, hinted at by Mercer if the survivor gains their trust.

characters.name: Mercer
characters.role: Leader of the scavengers, cunning and territorial, but not without reason.

characters.name: Lena
characters.role: A reluctant member of the scavengers who might help the survivor if approached carefully.

side_arcs.failure_consequences: If the survivor fails, they lose valuable supplies and are forced to take a more dangerous route out of the station, increasing the risk of encountering zombies or other threats.

side_arcs.title: The Whispering Tunnels
side_arcs.description: The survivor encounters a mysterious figure who seems to know about the fungal growths. This stranger leads them on a dangerous journey through the tunnels, revealing unsettling truths about the infection.

events.title: Echoes in the Dark
events.description: While scavenging in the tunnels, the survivor hears faint whispers. A shadowy figure watches from a distance, disappearing before they can get a clear look.

events.title: The Stranger's Mark
events.description: The survivor finds a strange symbol carved into the tunnel wall, leading to a hidden passage. The mysterious figure appears briefly, gesturing for them to follow.

events.title: Fungal Secrets
events.description: The stranger reveals themselves as a former scientist studying the fungal infection. They show the survivor a hidden lab, but it's overrun with mutated zombies.

events.title: The Truth Beneath
events.description: The scientist explains the fungal growths are part of a larger network, possibly sentient. They give the survivor a device to detect fungal hotspots before vanishing into the tunnels.

rewards.description: Fungal Detector: A device that warns of nearby fungal hotspots and infected areas.
Knowledge about the fungal network's behavior and potential weaknesses.

characters.name: Dr. Elias Voss
characters.role: A former scientist studying the fungal infection, now a wandering survivor with crucial knowledge.

side_arcs.failure_consequences: The survivor gains no insight into the fungal threat and remains vulnerable to unexpected outbreaks. Dr. Voss disappears, taking his knowledge with him.

side_arcs.title: The Whispering Tunnels
side_arcs.description: The survivor discovers cryptic messages left by a mysterious figure in the tunnels, leading to a tense encounter and a potential alliance. The stranger seems to know more about the fungal outbreak than they let on.

events.title: Echoes in the Dark
events.description: While scavenging, the survivor finds strange symbols carved into the tunnel walls, along with a fresh trail of supplies leading deeper into the station.

events.title: The Shadow Watcher
events.description: The survivor spots a cloaked figure observing them from a distance. When approached, the figure vanishes, leaving behind a map with marked safe zones.

events.title: The Meeting
events.description: The stranger finally makes contact, revealing they’ve been tracking the survivor. They offer information about a hidden cache in exchange for help clearing a blocked tunnel.

events.title: A Fragile Trust
events.description: After completing the task, the stranger shares a cryptic warning about the fungal zombies evolving. They vanish again, but leave behind a way to contact them in the future.

rewards.description: A cache of medical supplies and ammunition.
Clues about the origins of the fungal outbreak and potential safe zones.
A tentative alliance with the mysterious stranger, who may reappear in the main story.

characters.name: The Whisper
characters.role: A enigmatic survivor who knows more than they reveal, possibly connected to the outbreak.

side_arcs.failure_consequences: The stranger disappears permanently, taking valuable information with them. The survivor misses out on the cache and potential future aid.

side_arcs.title: The Station Squatters
side_arcs.description: A group of hostile survivors has taken up residence in the upper levels of Central Station, threatening the player's safe access to critical subway tunnels. The player must either drive them out or negotiate a truce before they become a permanent threat.

events.title: Unwelcome Neighbors
events.description: The player discovers signs of recent human activity in the station's upper concourse - fresh footprints, moved debris, and a crude barricade blocking access to the west tunnels.

events.title: First Contact
events.description: The squatters reveal themselves, demanding supplies in exchange for safe passage. They've booby-trapped several key routes and appear well-armed.

events.title: Showdown or Settlement
events.description: The player must either confront the squatters directly (through force or stealth) or negotiate a lasting agreement about territory sharing and tunnel access.

rewards.description: Access to previously blocked tunnels containing medical supplies and tools
Intel about safe surface routes from the squatters' scouting

characters.name: Mitch 'Rails' Donovan
characters.role: Leader of the station squatters, a former transit worker who knows the tunnel layouts

characters.name: The Twins
characters.role: Two silent teenage lookouts who communicate only through hand signals and station graffiti

side_arcs.failure_consequences: The squatters permanently block access to critical subway routes, forcing the player to take more dangerous surface paths between locations. They may also stage occasional raids on the player's supplies.

side_arcs.title: The Crimson Perimeter
side_arcs.description: The survivor notices increasing zombie activity near Fort Crimson and must reinforce the defenses before a predicted horde arrives. This involves scavenging for materials, setting up traps, and rallying other survivors to help.

events.title: Signs of the Storm
events.description: The survivor observes unusual zombie movements near the fort. Fungal whispers intensify, hinting at an impending horde. A decision is made to start fortifying immediately.

events.title: Scavenging for Supplies
events.description: The survivor ventures out to nearby ruins to gather materials like wood, metal, and nails. They must avoid or fight off zombies while collecting enough to reinforce the fort.

events.title: Traps and Defenses
events.description: With materials gathered, the survivor sets up barricades, spikes, and alarm systems around Fort Crimson. Other survivors are recruited to help, but trust is scarce.

events.title: The Horde Arrives
events.description: The predicted horde attacks at dusk. The survivor and their makeshift team must defend the fort using the newly set up defenses. Success means survival; failure means overrun.

rewards.description: Gain reinforced defenses for Fort Crimson, reducing future zombie threats.
Earn trust and loyalty from other survivors, unlocking new allies.
Learn more about the fungal whispers and their connection to zombie behavior.

characters.name: Riley
characters.role: Scavenger with knowledge of nearby supply caches

characters.name: Doc
characters.role: Medic who can treat injuries sustained during fortification

characters.name: Jax
characters.role: Former soldier who helps set up traps and defenses

side_arcs.failure_consequences: If the survivor fails, Fort Crimson is overrun by the horde, forcing them to flee and lose all progress made in fortifying the location. Allies may be lost, and future survival becomes significantly harder.
